page.title: 11Shops in Longfield
page.content: For its size,Longfield possesses many general and specialist shops. These are largely in Station Road. Apart from the usual supermarket,there are butchers' and a baker's shop;a Post Office and a chemist;a fish and chip shop and a newsagent;an off-licence and a bank. The more specialist shops include a Tool Hire,an antique shop,an insurance broker,a coal merchant,a woolshop and a sports shop. There is a boutique,a kitchen shop,a travel agent,an estate agent,two hairdresser's shops,a builders' merchant and a florist. A woolshop,a card and fancy goods shop,a carpet shop,an art shop,an optician,a tack shop,a dry cleaner and a rope shop form the retail and commercial heart of Longfield.
